parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Positions

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns position of an object (alias of [[getPos]]) or location (alias of [[locationPosition]]).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[position]] object

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - format [[PositionAGLS]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[position]] location

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> location: [[Location]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]] - format [x,y,z], where z is <tt>-1 * [[getTerrainHeightASL]]</tt> at the location
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _pos = [[position]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_myLocationHomePos = [[position]] myLocation;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getPos]], [[getPosATL]], [[getPosASL]], [[getPosASLW]], [[visiblePosition]], [[getPosVisual]], [[visiblePositionASL]], [[locationPosition]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.99|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
